High volume of incoming SYN packets with.Action: Monitor Zeek conn.log and tcp.log for high volumes of new connections (SYN packets) originating from a limited number of source IPs targeting specific internal endpoints/servers, where the connection state does not progress beyond SYN_SENT. Use time series analysis to detect sudden spikes in SYN traffic.

High volume of incoming ACK packets targ.Action: Monitor Zeek tcp.log for abnormally high volume of ACK packets targeting internal endpoints/servers without corresponding established connections (ACKs not part of a valid TCP stream). Identify source IPs generating high ACK volume. Correlate with system performance data (if available via other means) to see if high ACK volume precedes system sluggishness.
